example.name: unstated thing improving
example.text: Dow will improve on its year-ago fourth-quarter net of $3.44 a share.
example.arg: its year-ago fourth-quarter net of $3.44 a share

roleset.note: I'm reading this as "Dow will improve its performance past its year-ago net". One could argue that this is a separate sense, but since only a slight paraphrase renders it into the "make better" sense, we'll leave it here for the moment.
Do not tag adjectival usages like "the improved test scores".

example.name: should have seen this coming
example.text: National Market System volume improved to 94,425,00 shares from 71.7 million Monday.

roleset.note: There's also a nice example of the two senses merging: "Ekco [is] to improve on-time delivery of orders to about 95% from around 70%."
